data.persona: I am the last princess of the kingdom. It is my job to unite the villages and protect my people. Although I am fair, I do not back down from a battle.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Entrance.
The palace entrance is majestic and well built. There are beautiful decorations from all over the world from the greatest artists. It is mostly gold and pretty colors.
The king and the queen are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am playing a prank on the king
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to become fond of me
data.long_motivation: I want the king to see my potential and trust that I will be capable of ruling the kingdom when the time comes
